detail_desc: Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with petal-shaped plastic beads.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in linen jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Shortie briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cat eye sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Small bag with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 16x22 cm.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Straight, slightly shorter jumper in a fine-knit wool blend. Wide puff sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut top in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a lace yoke.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Adjustable chin strap with a toggle fastener. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Leather boots with studs, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Short shorts in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, small frill trim at the top, large patch pockets at the sides and wide legs.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Cropped jumper in a rib-knit viscose and cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, 3/4-length sleeves and overlocked edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Loose fit with front pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Sleeveless top in satin with a V-neck front and back and lace section at the top of the front.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Moisturising lip balm in a plastic pot with a lid. 3.7 g.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Multi-strand bracelet with imitation leather straps and a metal clasp with a magnetic fastener.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pointelle vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes, and a small satin bow at the front.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Sandals in imitation leather with metal studs, an ankle strap with a metal buckle and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Platform front 3.5 cm. Heel 7.5 cm.
Lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thong briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Pile-lined, imitation suede jacket with a hood, diagonal zip down the front, zipped chest pocket and side pockets. Slightly longer at the back.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front, leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and mesh linings and insoles.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Straps with adjustable buttoning, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft jersey lining at the top. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. One long-sleeved and one short-sleeved printed top. One pair of long bottoms and one pair of shorts, both with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wrapover funnel collar, print motif at the top, kangaroo pocket and raglan sleeves with textured sections. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length, low-rise leggings in glossy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Warm-lined boots in fabric with waterproof feet sections, a faux fur trim at the top and a reflective detail. Padded shaft with lacing and a plastic fastener at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles, and chunky soles.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar, small frill trim around the armholes, buttons down the front and ties at the front of the hem.

Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Ventilating mesh at the crotch, and zipped side pockets. Jersey inner shorts.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front and a double-layered, wrapover hood. Kangaroo pocket, twisted side seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Block-coloured cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening and embroidery at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with raw edges, a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short jacket in corduroy with metal buttons. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Unlined.
Fitted tops in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long tunic in soft cotton twill with a button placket, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with pearly plastic beads.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
